content: this pattern is password-encrypted so type in the word trinkets for access it is completely customizable by size you may need a second person to help take your measurements if you are making this for yourself can be lined using a basic sewn chemise pattern worn over top a bathing suit or tank top or wear it unlined to play peek-a-boo with a significant other the original garment and all test pieces were worked in size 10 cotton thread this piece would be absolutely luxurious in a silk or perhaps even a cashmere ooooo drool lace-weight i m sorry the pics aren t the best--to my chagrin my prototype was inadvertently thrown out by a spouse who didn t realize what it was now i have to start all over
